subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[dial]]
# to [[move]]
# to [[dispel]]
# to [[distribute]]; to [[allocate]]; to [[set aside]] ([[money]])
# to [[push]] [[aside]] with the foot, hand, stick, etc.
# to [[poke]] (a [[fire]])
# to [[turn around]]
# to [[play]] a [[pluck]]ed [[string instrument]]
# {{lb|zh|Wu}} to [[give]]
# [[plectrum]]
# {{zh-classifier|people or things|t=[[group]]; [[batch]]}}
